00069 /* ************************************************************************ */
00070 /* standard classes */
00071 
00072 /* the maximum number of user classes that are supported */
00073 enum {
00074   dMaxUserClasses = 4
00075 };
00076 
00077 /* class numbers - each geometry object needs a unique number */
00078 enum {
00079   dSphereClass = 0,
00080   dBoxClass,
00081   dCCylinderClass,
00082   dCylinderClass,
00083   dPlaneClass,
00084   dRayClass,
00085   dGeomTransformClass,
00086   dTriMeshClass,
00087 
00088   dFirstSpaceClass,
00089   dSimpleSpaceClass = dFirstSpaceClass,
00090   dHashSpaceClass,
00091   dQuadTreeSpaceClass,
00092   dLastSpaceClass = dQuadTreeSpaceClass,
00093 
00094   dFirstUserClass,
00095   dLastUserClass = dFirstUserClass + dMaxUserClasses - 1,
00096   dGeomNumClasses
00097 };

00127 /*
00128  * Set/get ray flags that influence ray collision detection.
00129  * These flags are currently only noticed by the trimesh collider, because
00130  * they can make a major differences there.
00131  */
00132 void dGeomRaySetParams (dGeomID g, int FirstContact, int BackfaceCull);
00133 void dGeomRayGetParams (dGeomID g, int *FirstContact, int *BackfaceCull);
00134 void dGeomRaySetClosestHit (dGeomID g, int closestHit);
00135 int dGeomRayGetClosestHit (dGeomID g);

00163 
00164 typedef void dGetAABBFn (dGeomID, dReal aabb[6]);
00165 typedef int dColliderFn (dGeomID o1, dGeomID o2,
00166              int flags, dContactGeom *contact, int skip);
00167 typedef dColliderFn * dGetColliderFnFn (int num);
00168 typedef void dGeomDtorFn (dGeomID o);
00169 typedef int dAABBTestFn (dGeomID o1, dGeomID o2, dReal aabb[6]);
00170 
00171 typedef struct dGeomClass {
00172   int bytes;
00173   dGetColliderFnFn *collider;
00174   dGetAABBFn *aabb;
00175   dAABBTestFn *aabb_test;
00176   dGeomDtorFn *dtor;
00177 } dGeomClass;
